summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1964, for the improvement of 4th Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East 60th Street to East 65th Street, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete walks, with wooden crosswalks thereon, together with all necessary drains therein, under Ordinance No. 20369 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
